players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I discovered last night. We need to be cautious around him."
You: "Charlie's claim is suspicious. He could be trying to deflect attention from himself."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie, Bob's behavior is suspicious. We should keep a close eye on him."
You: "I'm innocent, I didn't kill anyone."
